Html:
Hello,

how is possible to show a WPF UserControl that are defined in an another Assembly.

You discripe that the Source-Property of a link define the page/view localtion. Some of my controls but in different Assemblies.

Could someone give a example how I must define the Link properly?

Thank you

Solution: 
.Source = New Uri("/" & AssemblyName & ";component/" & UserControlName & ".xaml", UriKind.Relative)
